expo.name: RunRoom

infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: App uses your location permission to let others know where you are running now.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: App uses your location permission to let others know where you are running now.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: App uses your location permission to let others know where you are running now.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: App uses your library permission to get a picture for your avatar.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: App uses your camera permission to get a picture for your avatar.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: App uses your contacts to send an invitation.

expo.description: This is a project for Thomas Mulder.
